summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund in aid of the cost of providing arterial Lighting and Signalization along W. Dravus St. and 28th Ave. W. in connection with the improvement of W. Dravus St., Et Al, by Constructing Underground Utilities Lines and Residental Street Lighting System under Local Improvement District No.\_\_\_\_\_, as creates Lines and a Residential Street Lighting System under Local Improvement District No.\_\_\_\_\_, as created by Ordinance\_\_\_\_\_\_\_; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services therefor; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
